ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Selo's Consonant Chain
ygData.msgSnippet: I noticed very unreliabel results with it also last night in highkeep against everything i tried it on. from low blue outlooks/guards to the raiders which are
ygData.messageBody:
I noticed very unreliabel results with it also last
night in highkeep against everything i tried it on.
from low blue outlooks/guards to the raiders which are
still red. It normally works well for me except
against raiders and warriors, which are occasionally
too high lvl i think. Lvl 28, charisma approx 135.

--- Ken Bachman <kbachman@...> wrote:
> This is the same question I wanted to ask the list
> today. I was in
> frenzied last night and I got a ton of very early
> wear-off messages on
> this song. I was wondering whether I had found a
> sour spot in my
> twisting cycle (e.g., I was twisting just fast
> enough to get the song
> starts/song stops problem) or if this was a problem
> with Chains itself.
> At my level, the stuff we were fighting is mostly
> normal blue. The song
> ought to work pretty well.
>
> Kenross Cantoforjado, 47 songs, Innoruuk
>
>
> Adam Wasserman wrote:
> >
> > Hey,
> >
> > Now that we are getting messages when our song
> effects wear off, I've
> > noticed that our snare song amost never lasts the
> full duration. Many times
> > it wears off as soon as I finish singing it.
> >
> > I was wondering if any of you were having the same
> problem and whether or
> > not this is by design or a bug that we should
> bring to the attention of the
> > powers that be.
> >
> > Draelon
>


=====
Harmonie Moonsong 28th Composition in Progress High Keep, Norrath, Bristlebane server http://www.geocities.com/harmoniemoonsong
